mapper.select: SELECT p.pym_id, p.imp_uid, p.merchant_uid, p.member_id, p.cust_nm, p.cust_tel, p.cust_em_tel, p.cust_date, p.cust_memo, p.pym_price, p.pym_status, p.pym_method, p.pym_num, p.pym_date, p.coupon_discount, r.rsv_id, r.member_id AS r_member_id, r.prod_id, r.prod_type, r.prod_price, r.prod_nm, r.prod_detail, r.prod_photo, r.rsv_type, r.rsv_date, r.rsv_cnt FROM payment p LEFT JOIN payment_reservation_map prm ON p.pym_id = prm.pym_id LEFT JOIN reservation r ON prm.rsv_id = r.rsv_id WHERE p.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY p.pym_date DESC

SELECT DISTINCT r.prod_nm FROM payment p LEFT JOIN payment_reservation_map prm ON p.pym_id = prm.pym_id LEFT JOIN reservation r ON prm.rsv_id = r.rsv_id WHERE p.member_id = #{memberId} AND p.pym_status = 2 AND r.prod_nm IS NOT NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE payment SET pym_status = #{pymStatus}, refund_reason = #{refundReason}, refund_date = NOW() WHERE imp_uid = #{impUid}
mapper.select: SELECT p.pym_id, p.imp_uid, p.merchant_uid, p.member_id, p.cust_nm, p.cust_tel, p.cust_em_tel, p.cust_date, p.cust_memo, p.pym_price, p.pym_status, p.pym_method, p.pym_num, p.pym_date, p.refund_reason, p.refund_date, p.coupon_discount, r.rsv_id, r.member_id AS r_member_id, r.prod_id, r.prod_type, r.prod_price, r.prod_nm, r.prod_detail, r.prod_photo, r.rsv_type, r.rsv_date, r.rsv_cnt FROM payment p LEFT JOIN payment_reservation_map prm ON p.pym_id = prm.pym_id LEFT JOIN reservation r ON prm.rsv_id = r.rsv_id WHERE p.member_id = #{memberId} AND p.pym_status = 4 ORDER BY p.pym_date DESC
